rukus.text: 11|110|Ara abasya'i amara musake kitaba diyechilama, atahpara ete matabheda ghatechila. Ara apanara rabera purba sid'dhanta na thakale tadera mimansa to haye'i yeta [1]. Ara niscaya tara e byapare bibhrantikara sandehe nipatita [2].
11|111|Ara niscaya apanara raba tadera pratyekake tara karmaphala puropuri dedabena. Tara ya kare tini to se bisaye sabisesa abihata

11|112|kaje'i apani yebhabe adista hayechena tate abicala thakuna ebam apanara sathe yara ta'oba kareche tara'o [1]; ebam tomara simalanghana kara na [2]. Tomara ya kara niscaya tini tara samyaka drasta.

11|113|Ara yara yuluma kareche tomara tadera prati jhumke paro na; parale aguna tomaderake sparsa karabe [1]. E abasthaya allah‌ chara tomadera kono sahayyakari thakabe na. Tarapara tomaderake sahayya kara habe na.
11|114|Ara apani salata kayema karuna [1] dinera du prantabhage o ratera prathamanse [2]. Niscaya satkaja asat kajake mitiye deya [3]. Upadesa grahanakaridera jan'ya eta [4] eka upadesa.
11|115|Ara apani dhairya dharana karuna, karana niscaya allah‌ ihasanakaridera pratidana nasta karena na [1].

11|116|Ata'eba tomadera purbera prajanmasamuhera madhye emana prajnabana kena hayani, yara yamine biparyaya srsti theke nisedha karata? Alpa sankhyaka chara, yaderake amara tadera madhye najata diyechilama [1]. Ara yara yuluma kareche tara bilasitara pechane pare chila, ara tara chila aparadhi.
11|117|Ara apanara raba erupa nana ye, tini an'yayabhabe janapada dhbansa karabena athaca tamra adhibasira sansodhanakari [1].
11|118|Ara apanara raba icche karale samasta manusake eka jati karate paratena, kintu tara paraspara matabirodhakari'i raye geche [1].

11|119|Tabe tara naya, yaderake apanara raba daya kareche ebam tini taderake ejan'ya'i srsti karechena. Ara ‘ami jina o manusa ubhaya dbara jahannama purna karaba'i’, apanara rabera e katha purna hayeche [1].

11|120|Ara rasuladera ai saba brttanta amara apanara kache barnana karechi, ya dbara amara apanara cittake drrha kari, era madhyame apanara kache eseche satya ebam muminadera kache eseche upadesa o smarana.
11|121|Ara yara imana ane na taderake baluna, ‘tomara sba sba abasthane kaja karate thaka, amara'o kaja karachi.
11|122|‘Ebam tomara pratiksa kara, amara'o pratiksa karachi. ’

11|123|Asamanasamuha o yaminera gayeba allahara'i malikanaya ebam tamra'i kache sabakichu pratyabartana karano habe. Kaje'i apani tamra ibadata karuna ebam tamra upara nirbhara karuna. Ara tomara ya kara se sambandhe apanara raba gaphila nana [1].
